problem.markdown: >>If the figure above is folded on the dotted lines so that all the points labeled P touch each other, what three-dimensional figure will result?<< ( ) Star ( ) Rhombus (x) Pyramid ( ) Cube ( ) None of the above
problem.script: def hintfn1(answer_ids, student_answers, new_cmap, old_cmap): global expect aid = answer_ids[0] ans = student_answers[aid] if new_cmap.is_correct(aid): hint='Your answer has been submitted' new_cmap.set_hint_and_mode(aid,hint,'always') new_cmap.set_property(aid,'npoints',1) new_cmap.set_property(aid,'correctness','corrrectnr') else: hint='Your answer has been submitted' new_cmap.set_hint_and_mode(aid,hint,'always') new_cmap.set_property(aid,'npoints',1) new_cmap.set_property(aid,'correctness','incorrectnr') old_cmap=new_cmap
problem.p: If the figure above is folded on the dotted lines so that all the points labeled P touch each other, what three-dimensional figure will result?

choicegroup.label: If the figure above is folded on the dotted lines so that all the points labeled P touch each other, what three-dimensional figure will result?
